channel.title: Comments on: Attacking the right problem
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: riptari filter
item.dc:creator: riptari filter
item.description:
<strong>Remembering The Ugly American</strong>
Seeing multiplicity link to ThinkCycle yesterday reminded me that five or six years ago I read a book first published
